paragraphs.content: Psalm 136
paragraphs.contentHtml: Psalm 136

paragraphs.content: O give thanks unto the LORD; for he is good: for his mercy endureth for ever.
paragraphs.contentHtml: O give thanks unto the Lord; for he is good: for his mercy endureth for ever.

paragraphs.content: O give thanks unto the God of gods: for his mercy endureth for ever.
paragraphs.contentHtml: O give thanks unto the God of gods: for his mercy endureth for ever.

paragraphs.content: O give thanks to the Lord of lords: for his mercy endureth for ever.
paragraphs.contentHtml: O give thanks to the Lord of lords: for his mercy endureth for ever.

paragraphs.content: To him who alone doeth great wonders: for his mercy endureth for ever.
paragraphs.contentHtml: To him who alone doeth great wonders: for his mercy endureth for ever.

paragraphs.content: To him that by wisdom made the heavens: for his mercy endureth for ever.
paragraphs.contentHtml: To him that by wisdom made the heavens: for his mercy endureth for ever.

paragraphs.content: To him that stretched out the earth above the waters: for his mercy endureth for ever.
paragraphs.contentHtml: To him that stretched out the earth above the waters: for his mercy endureth for ever.

paragraphs.content: To him that made great lights: for his mercy endureth for ever:
paragraphs.contentHtml: To him that made great lights: for his mercy endureth for ever:

paragraphs.content: The sun to rule by day: for his mercy endureth for ever:
paragraphs.contentHtml: The sun to rule by day: for his mercy endureth for ever:

paragraphs.content: The moon and stars to rule by night: for his mercy endureth for ever.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The moon and stars to rule by night: for his mercy endureth for ever.

paragraphs.content: To him that smote Egypt in their firstborn: for his mercy endureth for ever:
paragraphs.contentHtml: To him that smote Egypt in their firstborn: for his mercy endureth for ever:

paragraphs.content: And brought out Israel from among them: for his mercy endureth for ever:
paragraphs.contentHtml: And brought out Israel from among them: for his mercy endureth for ever:

paragraphs.content: With a strong hand, and with a stretched out arm: for his mercy endureth for ever.
paragraphs.contentHtml: With a strong hand, and with a stretched out arm: for his mercy endureth for ever.

paragraphs.content: To him which divided the Red sea into parts: for his mercy endureth for ever:
paragraphs.contentHtml: To him which divided the Red sea into parts: for his mercy endureth for ever:

paragraphs.content: And made Israel to pass through the midst of it: for his mercy endureth for ever:
paragraphs.contentHtml: And made Israel to pass through the midst of it: for his mercy endureth for ever:

paragraphs.content: But overthrew Pharaoh and his host in the Red sea: for his mercy endureth for ever.
paragraphs.contentHtml: But overthrew Pharaoh and his host in the Red sea: for his mercy endureth for ever.

paragraphs.content: To him which led his people through the wilderness: for his mercy endureth for ever.
paragraphs.contentHtml: To him which led his people through the wilderness: for his mercy endureth for ever.

paragraphs.content: To him which smote great kings: for his mercy endureth for ever:
paragraphs.contentHtml: To him which smote great kings: for his mercy endureth for ever:

paragraphs.content: And slew famous kings: for his mercy endureth for ever:
paragraphs.contentHtml: And slew famous kings: for his mercy endureth for ever:

paragraphs.content: Sihon king of the Amorites: for his mercy endureth for ever:
paragraphs.contentHtml: Sihon king of the Amorites: for his mercy endureth for ever:

paragraphs.content: And Og the king of Bashan: for his mercy endureth for ever:
paragraphs.contentHtml: And Og the king of Bashan: for his mercy endureth for ever:

paragraphs.content: And gave their land for an heritage: for his mercy endureth for ever:
paragraphs.contentHtml: And gave their land for an heritage: for his mercy endureth for ever:

paragraphs.content: Even an heritage unto Israel his servant: for his mercy endureth for ever.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Even an heritage unto Israel his servant: for his mercy endureth for ever.

paragraphs.content: Who remembered us in our low estate: for his mercy endureth for ever:
paragraphs.contentHtml: Who remembered us in our low estate: for his mercy endureth for ever:

paragraphs.content: And hath redeemed us from our enemies: for his mercy endureth for ever.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And hath redeemed us from our enemies: for his mercy endureth for ever.

paragraphs.content: Who giveth food to all flesh: for his mercy endureth for ever.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Who giveth food to all flesh: for his mercy endureth for ever.

paragraphs.content: O give thanks unto the God of heaven: for his mercy endureth for ever.
paragraphs.contentHtml: O give thanks unto the God of heaven: for his mercy endureth for ever.
